name: EDEN: A Genesis Through Time
description:
You wake up in Medical to an abandoned spacecraft.
You have no recollection as to who you are.
Where is everyone? and what happened on this ship?
Your journey on the EDEN-03 Cargo vessel awaits.

Features

  • Four Possible Endings
  • Authentic Original Soundtrack
  • Fleshed Out Story
  • Achievements
  • Easter Eggs
